reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Urgent response project for those affected by the Beirut Port disaster.

description.narrative: Emergency and urgent response to alleviate the suffering of the Lebanese brothers affected by the disaster of the Port of Beirut in the Republic of Lebanon by providing food, shelter and non-food items to those affected by the disaster. Reducing the financial burden on the affected families in light of the lack of power as a result of this disaster and their inability to work

Sending relief planes for emergency and urgent response to alleviate the suffering of the Lebanese brothers affected by the Beirut Port disaster in the Republic of Lebanon, carrying food, shelter and non-food items to those affected by the disaster

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
